website_summaries.verdict: This second Hamilton Beach model of the popular 1.1 cu. ft. size offers the same power and space benefits of the first model with slightly altered dimensions.
pros: ft. model, this unit provides an impressive 1000W of cooking power, and is compact enough to fit in most kitchen spaces
Taller but not quite as wide as the other model, it offers an alternative for users with a different kitchen layout or arrangement
Available in stainless steel or red
cons: Some users have reported some wear to the keypad after a few months of use

website_summaries.verdict: An excellent mid-size microwave that’s large enough for most families’ needs but still saves space. Powerful and efficient in spite of its size.
pros: Mid-range size fits most kitchen counters
6 pre-set options including popcorn, pizza, and baked potato
Classic stainless steel finish works with a wide range of décor
cons: Keypad can show signs of wear after only a few months

customer_reviews.title: Larger compassibility
customer_reviews.text: It is very big in the in side great price for the larger microwaves out there.
customer_reviews.author: angela britt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One month using it. No problems perfect product. Thanks Amazon 😊
customer_reviews.author: Yunus

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: What I expected in every way; perfectly satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NAC

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: works great. a bit noisy - rattling noise - but runs great. can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Eyes "Marsha"

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your bucks
customer_reviews.text: Good rice tried to buy another one but too high now
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: work fine for the money
customer_reviews.text: had the same one for 4 years still worked fine wife wanted change so I got the same one
customer_reviews.author: gary meadows

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great, perfect size for my space. Fast shipping and wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: There is something deffinet wrong with this microwave, it makes a lot of noise when operating it!
customer_reviews.author: lester smith

customer_reviews.title: It workes great and has all the features I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It workes great and has all the features I was looking for. Although it is kinda noisy and the buzzer doesn't stop when you open the door. Other than that it works as it should and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fine microwave and quite
customer_reviews.text: It runs quite and does what is should do. No complaints. Has many preset settings i like, I usually don;t read the manual so i didn't know that for awhile. ;) I like the 1.1 cu size. In microwaves be sure to keep mica screen clean, if sparking occurs it's usually due to this problem and can ruin some elements in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Morris

customer_reviews.title: BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEPING HOT POCKETS ARE DONE MAN LOL
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel and black microwave looks great right well did you also know with all it many cooking features is can do almost anything lol hahahahaha it has programmable features also click timer rotating and can fit a small ham or turkey inside too trust me I have done it this was a Christmas gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R VALDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the 30-second timer, it's awesome 🌟 for 90-second you press the 30-second button 3 times, it's great. Very easy to use Great microwave oven
customer_reviews.author: Robin Heier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have had this item for a few months now and it works well for our staff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Good item at a good price and fast delivery. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this microwave. Within a short period of time, the wheels damage the paint underneath them and start stripping the paint off, revealing rusty metal underneath. It gets worse and worse with each use. Our microwave is less than a year old and there is about a 1” wide rusty ring under the plate (see photo). I will not buy any more Hamilton Beach products.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: You might think all microwaves are created equal, but they're not. This one is pretty weak. It takes twice as long to cook any dish and thawing a frozen item can take even longer. We've had it less than a year and already the laminated buttons are starting to separate (making it look very cheap, or old). This was a Wal-mart special at $79.99, but I'm going to recommend you buy a 1500w microwave from some other company. Our earlier GE models lasted about 10yrs each.
customer_reviews.author: B Parker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- HB does not stand behind product
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! This microwave stopped heating 6 mos after purchase. Contacted HB and they worked with us; only to have it reoccur 1 month later. They said they would refund money in 6-8 wks; 12 wks later they said they lost our original docs and we are out of luck for refund!!
customer_reviews.author: BETH

customer_reviews.title: On mine the interior rusted out in less than four years
customer_reviews.text: Have had mine for 3 1/2 years. Still runs good except for the turntable. The inside roller track for the turntable rusted clear thru. After reading some of the reviews I wish I had a guiger counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jaws46

customer_reviews.title: It a great little microwave
customer_reviews.text: It a great little microwave. We've never had any issues from it and it cooks pretty evenly for being a cheapo microwave. We've had it for almost 2 yrs now, and it still runs like it did on day one. We give it an A+ from our household.
customer_reviews.author: cleverlittlefox

customer_reviews.title: End Beep normal at first, then goes on forever
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, choose longer reheat time, as it's weak. This I could live with, as well as the start button wearing away through plastic. Used only for coffee reheat, just press start for 1 min. ISSUE for 2 star: longest end beep was 12 minutes. It just goes nuts on its own. So, beware. In garbage now before anything else happens.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews have stated
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have stated, this microwave was just not powerful enough to cut it in my kitchen. I only ended up buying this since it was on sale at walmart, but after 2 months of use, I came to regret going for the "cheap buy." I don't even cook full meals in it like some do, but heating up leftovers and defrosting frozen chicken became a pain with this microwave. I ended up returning it walmart and just putting the cash towards a nicer microwave with similar wattage, but newer "inverter" technology. I guess with microwaves you truly do get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure how much it leaks, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how much it leaks, but interior will rust where turntable turns after couple of years use.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: flawed defrost
customer_reviews.text: Product defrost by weight doesn't work for under one pound
customer_reviews.author: Simple Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great heats up stuff does what a microwave should do.
customer_reviews.author: usmle step taker

customer_reviews.title: Beware these are becoming a hot thrift store item, meaning defective
customer_reviews.text: I have seen several of these units come through the local thrift store and even though you are paying alot less you are also getting alot less. My particular unit would start and rotate on the carousel but would not heat the food or water. This is only after a few weeks of use. To repair you need to open the box ( not recommended due to high voltage ), and replace parts that are not cheap, for its not a simple fuse fix. NOT WORTH IT. so on to a better brand like Farberware, Toshiba, or LG, or GE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the couple days it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Good microwave til it died a couple days into owning it. Bought a replacement capacitor wondering if it had blown, but no good. Now I'm out the cost of the microwave and the capacitor, good times!
customer_reviews.author: C Steed

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, but there are probably better for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for years with no issues. I only reheat food in it so.... The only problem I have is that you can't shut off the beeping sounds, no quiet mode, and the "done" beeps keep going even when you open the door. To this day I can't understand how a simple device like a MW is missing ANY features. China I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MRF

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The numbers on the front starting wearing off within a few months. It stopped heating before it was a year old. Another piece of junk to add to my long list. I will try another brand but dont have very high expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Max Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Still working and it is a 2015 model. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Still working and it is a 2015 model. It puts out the same 1000 watts of power as my old unit that broke did it was a different mfg also. Cooks/heats things just as quick as it did and it is much quieter so buy this forget those other WAWAWA post this works as it should!
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Potentially harmful product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this microwave in Wallmart. After finding that it leaks serious power on the front, greater than recommended 5 mw/cm2 close to the doors and greater than 0.01 mw/cm2 at the distances up to 4 feet, even when filled with water and food, I had to return it. Normal microwave should have power much less than 0.01 mw/cm2 just a few inches away from it at any place. I think this product is dangerous and should not be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 1.1 Cu Ft Microwave Em031mzc-x1
product_meta.description: Great for busy families, you can heat up or defrost frozen food with the Hamilton Beach 1.1 cu ft Microwave Oven, so you'll never have to wait for frozen food items to defrost. It has an output of 1000W and includes 10 power levels so you can heat up a wide range of foods with the necessary intensity. The LED display is easy to read and the touch-pad lets you choose between six quick-set buttons. This white microwave oven includes a lockout feature for child safety, as well as a timer and clock feature. It comes in other colors to suit your personal tastes and decor scheme.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
